Primary Contact: Lenetta Parry, Executive Director; Email: info@cofoodbank.com
Alternate Contact: David Purdon, Associate Executive Director; Email: david@cofoodbank.com
Service Details: - Provides children from ages one to 12 years with a one week supply of ready-to-eat, healthy, nutritious (age appropriate) snacks to take to pre-school, day care or school- These snack packs include (but are not limited to) fresh fruit, cello-packaged fresh produce, yogurt, cheese, 100% fruit juice boxes and healthy granola bars
Hours: Kelowna Office Hours:  Mon-Fri: 8:00am - 4:00pmWest Kelowna Office Hours:  Mon-Fri: 8:00am - 3:00pm
How to Apply: Please visit our website, email or phone for additional information on applying for the Kids Snack Pack Program
